title: Is education important to earn livelihood? - Quora

response.answer_text: Education is important in all the aspects of life. From eating to traveling to earn livelihood, education plays a major role everywhere. Not only education explores the dept of your mind but helps in building a better verseion of you. Definitely there are howard dropouts like mark zuckerberg, but not every collehe dropout is succesful. Mark knew where he wanted to go amd what he wanted to do. Not everyone does. Even then mark was educated in the field of computer. Education is not about knowing everything, But knowing about the things that interests you. You can think of a software but without education how will you develop its programme?

Now again things are changing.. Toppers clears all entrances and get into colleges and finally fly abroad to work there whereas rich kids just studies for time pass and take over father's business.. Thise who get struck in middle in both studies and economic status..just get qualified for name sake and roams to get a job as per the qualifications.. Its not late to see the demand and work Accordingly right..Take education for knowledge but don't depend your livelihood on it..
